text:
@realDonaldTrump With your...
MISHANDLING OF: •Coronavirus response, •Equitable tax structures, •Economy
PROTECTION FOR: •Rule of Law, •Environment
YOU ARE THE SWAMP!
Help Americans drain it...Conduct your own Saturday massacre (firing all your WH cronies, advisors, ect), then RESIGN!
